summary: The document is a payroll certification for the U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on Assassinations, covering the accounting period from 11/01/77 to 11/30/77. It details employees' names, positions, Social Security numbers, annual salaries, period earned, and remarks regarding their employment status such as appointments, terminations, and payroll changes.
key_findings: The payroll includes a wide range of positions from Staff Counsel and Staff Investigators to Secretaries and Document Clerks.
Salaries vary significantly, with the minimum being $1,200.00 and the maximum at $47,500.00 annually.
Several employees have remarks noting changes in their payroll status, appointments, or terminations during the period.
The document also includes a section certifying that the listed employees have performed their assigned duties and have no relationship to a current Member of Congress unless noted.
